attributes.action: people on unemployment benifits and low incomes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: petition is for people on low incomes and gov unemployment benifits and disabled people to have a reduction for water rates to be vastly reduced say to maximum of £2.00 beacuse it is a lot to pay what they ask and they take you to court it is just to much many people have county court jugments against them beacuse of water companys best regards heres looking to another term of labour god bless

rejection.details:
The petition contains a reference to "Labour" which renders this petition invalid. If you would like to re-submit the petition, please take out this reference.

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
